department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Request for Proposal to purchase 40 office tables with an expected start date of November 7th, 2022 and a delivery time frame of January 2nd to 31st, 2023. Price and terms not specified. Seeking suppliers with CFTA membership.
description: Solicitation to purchase office furniture, estimated quantity of commodity: 40, duration of contract: November 7th, 2022 to January 31st 2023, delivery of goods: January 2nd to January 31st 2023. Conditions for participation of suppliers.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for Office Furniture - Electric Tables
## Request for Proposal
### Solicitation Number: 20231283
### Publication Date: October 27, 2022
### Tender Closing Date: November 7, 2022 (13:00:00)

**Summary**

Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking proposals for the delivery of office furniture, specifically electric tables. The estimated quantity of commodities required is 40 units. The proposed contract duration is from November 7, 2022, to January 31, 2023. Delivery must occur between January 2, 2023, and January 31, 2023.

### Definitions and Requirements

* Estimated quantity: 40 units of electric tables
* Contract duration: November 7, 2022, to January 31, 2023
* Delivery timeframe: January 2, 2023, to January 31, 2023

### Eligibility Requirements

The Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) applies to this tender. Suppliers must ensure their proposals meet the requirements outlined below:

* Compliance with CETA
* Adherence to the solicitation documentation

### Important Contact Information

* Requesting Department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Contracting Authority: Marie-Eve Gauthier (marie-eve.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Additional Attachments

* Questions and answers (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/f35bed9fd2785e6a846494abbd059ace/questions-en.docx](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/f35bed9fd2785e6a846494abbd059ace/questions-en.docx)
* Questions and answers (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/0d5b6385a758e8ffcf0cc417fb2ac509/questions-fr.docx](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/0d5b6385a758e8ffcf0cc417fb2a c509/questions
